mapper.insert: insert into suggestion_t (sg_subject, sg_writer, sg_write_date, sg_hit, sg_content, sg_file, notice, status) values (#{sg_subject}, #{sg_writer}, now(), 0, #{sg_content}, #{sg_file}, #{notice}, 0)
